articles.description: Using a strict vegan diet, exercise, stress reduction and social support, Dr. Dean Ornish reversed heart disease in a 1990 clinical trial. Today he's trying to use the same approach on dementia.
articles.content: (CNN)In 1990, internal medicine specialist Dr. Dean Ornish did what no other doctor had been able to do: He published results of a randomized clinical trial that used advanced imagery scans to show c… [+7307 chars]

articles.title: Monkeypox Vs Chickenpox: Key Differences According To Doctors - NDTV
articles.description: Skin rashes and fever, the common symptoms in both monkeypox and chickenpox have caused confusion among people although doctors have stressed that there is a difference in the way the symptoms of both viral diseases manifest in patients.
articles.content:
In the rainy season, chickenpox cases are largely on the rise.
